Shared Care Support: The City of Ottawa is committed to the inclusion of all campers. To best support children at camp, please make us aware of any diagnosed or undiagnosed cognitive differences or behaviours your child may have early on. Making us aware early on will help our coordinators arrange for any additional supports that may be needed. If your child requires integration support at school, please contact the Inclusive Recreation team at InclusiveRecreation-LoisirsInclusifs@ottawa.ca. 1:1 Shared Care support can be offered at no cost for 2 weeks. Please be advised that Shared Care is based on a first-come, first-served basis. Please reach out early to secure your spot and allow enough time for the intake process prior to the start of camp. Camp participation criteria will be used to determine eligibility for Shared Care support.
